sentence.Network_en: You can sigh away half your youth if you choose to allow failed relationship to sadden you.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你陷于失败的伤感中,你就会使前半生在叹息中度过.

sentence.Network_en: Don't sadden your friends and gladden your enemies.
Do not sadden your friends and gladden your enemies.

entry.def: If something saddens you, it makes you feel sad.

example.ex: The cruelty in the world saddens me incredibly.
example.tran: 人世间的残酷无情让我感到无比悲哀。

means.word_mean: 1. make unhappy; `The news of her death saddened me'

sentences.cn: 我得知这个消息后很难过。

sentences.en: I saddened at the memory of his death.
sentences.cn: 我想到他已亡故就难过。

jushi.english: We were saddened to hear of the death of your mother.
jushi.chinese: 得知你母亲去世的消息我们很悲痛。
听到这个坏消息后我们非常伤心。

jushi.english: The death of his father saddened him.
